p: Table 3 showed skin tolerance test findings. Rabbits showed no irritation signs or skin edema after treatment with 10% ointment of L. angustifolia EO. The treated skin was intact; no inflammation and erythema compared to untreated site ( Figure 2). Edema and erythema score was “0” in each rabbit at any time of the observation after removing the test material. This demonstrated that the skin Primary Irritation Index score was 0.
